cards.name: Wiccan
cards.ability: On Reveal: If you've spent all your Energy on previous turns, +2 Max Energy.

cards.name: Hulkling
cards.ability: At the start of the game, copy the text of a random 6-Cost card.

cards.name: Man-Thing
cards.ability: Ongoing: 1, 2, and 3-Cost cards here have -2 Power.

cards.name: Angel
cards.ability: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your hand or deck to replace it.

cards.name: Lady Deathstrike
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy each card here with 3 or less Power.

cards.name: Cassandra Nova
cards.ability: On Reveal: Steal 1 Power from each card in your opponent's deck.

cards.name: Thena
cards.ability: After each turn, +3 Power if you played (exactly) 2 cards.

cards.name: Arishem
cards.ability: At the start of the game, +1 Max Energy. Shuffle 15 random cards into your deck.

cards.name: Sandman
cards.ability: On Reveal: Players can only play 1 card next turn.

cards.name: Mind Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Draw 2 Stones from your deck.

cards.name: Nocturne
cards.ability: You can move this once. When this moves, replace its location with a random new one.

items.name: Arishem
changes: 7/7 - At the start of the game, +1 Max Energy. Shuffle 12 random cards into your deck.
7/7 - At the start of the game, +1 Max Energy. Shuffle 15 random cards into your deck.
